text: tum jaha kahi bhi ho mauth tumhe aa pakdegi, go tum mazbooth qilo mein ho,aur agar unhe koyi bhalaayi milti hai to kehte hai ke ye Allah ta’ala ki taraf se hai aur agar koyi buraayi pahonchti hai to keh uthte hai ke ye teri taraf se hai,unhe keh do ke ye sab kuch Allah ta’ala ki taraf se hai,unhe kya ho gaya hai ke koyi baath samajhne ke bhi qareeb nahi
